experiences.title: Software Development Internship
experiences.description: During my internship at Tierra Audio, I had the opportunity to work on the development of a plugin based on the JUCE framework. The goal was to remotely control an audio hardware device using WebSocket technology. I collaborated with the UI/UX team to create an intuitive and functional interface for the end user.

experiences.title: Mathematics Private Tutor
experiences.description: Personalized tutoring for high school students, helping them improve their grades and understanding of key concepts. Developed teaching methodologies tailored to the individual needs of students.

experiences.title: Lifeguard
experiences.description: Supervision and assurance of safety, performing first aid tasks and assistance in emergency situations. Maintained safety standards and compliance with regulations in aquatic facilities.

projects.title: Music Streaming App
projects.description: Spotify Clone coded in Kotlin and developed in Android Studio, fetches the songs from a Firebase database and provides the feature of adjusting the device volume with the user speed (making use of GPS).

projects.title: Robot with Obstacle Detection
projects.description: Autonomous Vehicle Project developed in C, shows the acquired knowledge in several peripherals controlled by the microcontroller NUCLEO-L152RE Board by STMicroelectronics.
